entry.title: Re-enabling simple tx replacement
entry.summary: In an email exchange on January 4, 2015, Ross Nicoll expressed his gratitude towards a code solution presented by someone in response to his query. He mentioned trying out a patch suggested by Peter for testnet the following day, stating that it seemed like it would resolve his issue. Additionally, he commended the use of code as a means of communication, acknowledging its usefulness and expressing a desire for more people to utilize it.
